title: PMS 2.0 741 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 2 Preview/Picks, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk In Studio
description: On today's show, Pat is live on location in Boone, North Carolina from the set of College GameDay as he, AJ Hawk, and the boys recap last night's Thursday Night Football game on Prime, what they liked about the presentation, how the Chiefs are still the Chiefs, Brandon Staley's coaching decisions, and if there is concern for Justin Herbert's injury going forward. Plus, Pat and AJ Hawk go through the entire NFL Week 2 slate and give their analysis and picks for every single game (1:13:17-1:42:24). Also joining the progrum to chat about Justin Herbert and Corey Linsley's injuries and if they're potentially long term, if David Bakhtiari is good to go for the Packers as well other injury updates from Green Bay, if JK Dobbins is good to go for the Ravens, the Colts having a walk through today because they are so banged up, the latest on Dak's injury update, and who else might be up or down for this weekend's games (22:21-42:53). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
